analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#576-590):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#588-589)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#590)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#417-476):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#426-436)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#441-445)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#461-462)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#459-461)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#417-476):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#426-436)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#441-445)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#462-468)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#466-468)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#52-57) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#441-445)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#489-510):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#494-498)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#729-760) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#744-760)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#748-760)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#270-273)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#226-227)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x170c9d5638a504a271912a374a27c85a88ed2be9.sol#253-254)
